channel.title: How to add ::master
channel.description:
hey im using palidino76 base marvelscape 508/525, and i was just wondering how i can add ::master command which sets all combat levels to 99.
thanks

item.title: How to add ::master
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Dastan, Wrong. Thats the 317 Command.

508 Master Command:

if (cmd[0].equals("master")) { for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) { p.skillLvl[i] = 99; p.skillXP[i] = 13036000; p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, i); p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

And Use the [code ][/code ]
For commands or anything else.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add ::master
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}

change the player rights to w/e u want

add it in client.java between other commands.

Read full topic
